variable.name: pedno
variable.description: The family number, present for all subjects found in the pedigree file, and absent for those not included in the pedigree file.

variable.name: itwin
variable.description: Used to designate IDENTICAL individuals within families. The pairs within families have the same number, so that the first identical pair are both designated as 1, the second pair are both designated as 2, there are no families at present with more than two pairs of identical twins.

variable.name: idtype
variable.description: Refers to the Framingham cohort the sample comes from, useful to identify which files phenotypes will be found
variable.value: Spouses of first offspring recruits, aka NOS; n=103

variable.name: consent_0309
variable.description: Subject consent for true Framingham participants. Consents are missing for non-participants.
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects.

variable.name: geno_0309
variable.description: Equals one if subject appears in genotype files
